sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class Block extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) } componentDidMount() { const block_hash = this.props.match.params.block_hash this.props.fetchBlock(block_hash) } componentWillReceiveProps(nextProps) { if (this.props.match.params.block_hash !== nextProps.match.params.block_hash) { this.props.fetchBlock(nextProps.match.params.block_hash); } } render() { const { current_block } = this.props var time = new Date(current_block.time * 1000).toString().slice(0,-33) if (Object.entries(current_block).length === 0) return null; debugger return (

Block #{current_block.height}

Summary

Number of Transaction

{current_block.n_tx}

Height

{current_block.height}

Timestamp

{time}

Bits

{current_block.bits}

Size

{current_block.size}

Version

{current_block.ver}

Nonce

{current_block.nonce}

Hash

Hash

{current_block.hash}

Prev Block

{current_block.prev_block}

Next Block(s)

{current_block.next_block}

Merkle Root

{current_block.mrkl_root}

) } } export default Block
